content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': "This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to browse Lingoda for details on their writing course in Spanish, but instead found information on their Language Sprint program. However, I then received a command to browse Instituto Hemingway's website for details on their online Spanish writing course. The website provided information on a 30-hour course designed to help students improve their writing skills, with a certificate awarded upon completion. The course is conducted via a virtual classroom and is completed at the student's own pace. Links to more information and other Spanish courses were also provided. \n\nI was then given a command to browse the website for information on the process of signing up for the online Spanish writing course offered by Instituto Hemingway. However, the website did not provide any information on the process for signing up."}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "how to sign up for online spanish writing course offered by Instituto Hemingway"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://www.goabroad.com/providers/instituto-hemingway/programs/online-spanish-course-for-heritage-speakers-158314", "https://www.institutohemingway.com/news/513/online-spanish-writing-course.html", "https://www.gooverseas.com/language-schools/spain/program/270579", "https://www.institutohemingway.com/blog/871/how-to-know-the-characteristics-and-needs-of-your-students-before-the-first-class.html", "https://www.gooverseas.com/internships-abroad/spain/program/64861", "https://hemingwayapp.com/", "https://www.gooverseas.com/volunteer-abroad/spain/program/222247", "https://gogoespana.com/en/language-schools-in-spain/bilbao/instituto-hemingway/"]'}]
"""
